key.name: debug
key.description: Whether to send debug information to the system log.

key.name: dash-location
key.description: Where the dash is located.

key.name: dash-location-monitor
key.description: On which monitor the dock is located.

key.name: dash-per-workspace
key.description: Whether to show only windows of the current workspace.

key.name: top-bar-appearance-merge
key.description: Whether to use a custom theme for the dash that allows it to visually blend into the top bar.

key.name: top-bar-move-center
key.description: Whether to the top bar's center box to the right.

key.name: top-bar-custom-height
key.description: Whether to set a custom height for the top bar.

key.name: top-bar-height
key.description: Custom height for the top bar.

key.name: dock-icon-size
key.description: Icon size for the dock.

key.name: dock-stretch
key.description: Whether to to stretch the dock to fill the monitor edge.

key.name: dock-borders
key.description: Whether to show border when docked on left or right monitor edges.

key.name: dock-alignment
key.description: How to align icons in the dock.

key.name: dock-visibility
key.description: When to show the dock.

key.name: applications-button
key.description: Whether and where to show the applications button.

key.name: icons-highlight-focused
key.description: Whether to highlight the icon for the currently focused application.

key.name: icons-highlight-focused-gradient
key.description: Whether to use color gradient when highlighting the icon for the currently focused application.

key.name: icons-indicate-number-of-windows
key.description: Whether to indicate the number of open windows for each icon.

key.name: menu-application
key.description: Hide the top bar application menu and show it in the relevant icon's popup menu instead.

key.name: menu-media-controls
key.description: Whether to show media controls in the popup menu if supported by the application.

key.name: icons-left-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is left-clicked.

key.name: icons-middle-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is middle-clicked.

key.name: icons-hover
key.description: What to do when the mouse hovers over an icon.

key.name: icons-wheel-scroll
key.description: Whether to cycle windows when mouse wheel scrolling on an icon.

key.name: icons-window-matchers
key.description: Matches application IDs to WM_CLASS and optionally WM_CLASS_INSTANCE.
